column1: The Lexington Traffic Management Center and LFUCG city offices will be closed on Friday July 3 for the 4th of July holiday.
Regular traffic reports will resume Monday July 6 at 6:30 a.m.

column4: Roadway shutdown in both directions between Towne Center Dr and Lisle Industrial Rd until further notice due to a serious collision.
Detour is Taylor Dr -> Meadowthorpe Ave -> Burke Rd, and vice-versa.
